meanings: be more difficult than one may think

vlive.korean: 이건 어렵다 - 어렵다, 이거 - 요즘? This is hard. - It's hard. - These days? 듣기 View video OSEN : Stray KIds 스트레이키즈, 함께 여행가고 싶은 멤버 누구? #스타로드 10
vlive.english: This is hard. - It's hard. - These days?

vlive.korean: [너무 어렵다] - 그러니까... - 뭐라고요? [So difficult] - So... - What did you say? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.6
vlive.english: [So difficult] - So... - What did you say?

vlive.korean: [고뇌] - 어렵다 - 1, 2, 3... - 상큼? [Thinking hard] - It's difficult. - 1, 2, 3. - Sang Keum (Refreshing)? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SEVENTEEN] 와 완전 안메를 뒤집어 놓으셨다! 역시 최고의 치즈!🧀 (SEVENTEEN playing the consonant game)

examples.korean: The layout is hard to fault ergonomically. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 설계는 인체 공학적으로 흠을 잡기 어렵다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The layout is hard to fault ergonomically. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The situation scarcely warrants their / them being dismissed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 상황으로 보아 그들의 해고가 타당하다고 보기 어렵다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The situation scarcely warrants their / them being dismissed. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I find that hard to believe. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 그게 믿기 어렵다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I find that hard to believe. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She’s a bit heavy going. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 좀 다루기 어렵다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She’s a bit heavy going. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It’s pretty hard to explain. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것은 설명하기가 좀 어렵다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s pretty hard to explain. Add to Wordbook
